mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentoring (follower, guider, mtitle, mcontent, field, lang) VALUE (#{follower}, #{guider}, #{mtitle}, #{mcontent}, #{field}, #{lang});
mapper.update: UPDATE mentoring SET mreply = #{mreply}, replydate = now() WHERE mtrno = #{mtrno};
mapper.select: SELECT mtr.mtrno, mtr.follower, mtr.mtitle, mtr.mcontent, mtr.regdate, mtr.replydate, m.mname FROM mentoring mtr JOIN member m ON mtr.follower = m.email WHERE guider = #{value}
